name: Glyph - Open Alpha
description:
This is the download page for the Glyph Alpha

Glyph is a challenging atmospheric platformer in early stages of development. As such, a lot of mechanics, information, features, feedback and polish is missing in this prototype build.

Join our Discord, give your feedback and help us making the game even better!

 >> JOIN DISCORD HERE <<
>>Feedback Form<<
>>Follow us on Twitter<<

Explore expansive non-linear maps

Conquer the ruins! There are multiple ways to complete each level. You will have to explore and take chances to win. Grab the keys scattered out on each level and exit through the portal.

Collect and survive

Collect coins and gems to use when unlocking new areas, but beware of deadly traps!

Be an achiever and earn cosmetics

Grab all coins to unlock the artifact, they are hidden in special places, to win a cool skin or an sparkling trail.

Controls:

We recommend you play the game using a controller, but mouse and keyboard is available.

Known bugs and missing features
  • The main hub is under development, the hub is where you unlock new areas, at the moment this is changed out with a placeholder containing 14/78 levels.
  • Cosmetics UI hasn't been implemented yet, so you'll have to wait until we are done implementing it before you can choose your awesome rewards.
  • The settings menu hasn't been implemented yet
